@pulvdiggity @manbearkitten at the time of my father's passing we were all still living at home so he hadn't filled up our bedrooms... basement, garage, attic, and the master were chock-a-block with stuff. Some useful, some sentimental, but a lot was never going to be used again.
Gotta say, FX has really gone all-in on the miniseries and it is 100% working for them. Makings some serious quality television.
@pulvdiggity @manbearkitten Thats how my dad was, very much. We kept everything... He passed away eight years ago and the attic at my mom's is still full to the brim with stuff.
